hotels.title: Stylish Kanazawa City Break Near Renowned Kenroku-en Gardens
hotels.description: Discover the soul of the Hokuriku Region with a stay at ANA Holiday Inn Kanazawa Sky, an IHG Hotel, the perfect gateway to one of Japan’s most beguiling cities - and an easy stroll from JR Kanazawa Station and Kenroku-en, Japan’s most renowned gardens. After days spent exploring seafood markets or nearby historic Kanazawa Castle, head to KENROKU for a taste of the local sea crab or Hoh-Oh Sichuan Cuisine for mouth-numbingly delicious Chinese plates.
